purpose: Illustrate the importance of TSR and its supporting metrics
title: TSR should be the capstone metric

levels.label:
TSR
Total share holder return is a historical and comprehensive value creation metric used for external reporting and proxy

iTSR
Internal value creation metric and analog to TSR is used for planning, scenario development, tradeoff assessment, M&A assessment, incentive compensation- historical & forecast, portfolio roles

EPS, ROS, EBITDA operating margin
Key profit growth, guidance and reporting metrics are important to investors and which will determine key investor segments

ROIC, operating cash and cash flow
Supporting business health metrics(cash on cash returns) is also useful for benchmarking, resource allocation and portfolio signaling(grow, maintain, harvest, divest)

Key value drivers
Operating levers to improve value creation(e.g. customer retention/satisfaction, days sales in inventory; quality measure in rejected parts per million, pricing realization)
